video_prompt: Futuristic city lights twinkle and ripple across a vast urban sprawl. Towering structures are periodically shrouded by passing mists. The lone figure on the platform subtly shifts, their gaze following the celestial body as it drifts across a moody sky. Distant lights pulse within colossal buildings.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Futuristic, dystopian cityscape at night, viewed from a high vantage point. Colossal, ancient-futuristic skyscrapers frame a sprawling, twinkling urban sprawl. A lone figure in dark, bulky clothing stands with their back to the viewer on a dark metallic platform, gazing at the vast city. A large, ethereal moon or distant planet hangs in a moody, cloudy sky. Dramatic lighting, grandeur, forlornness.
refined_video_prompt: City lights dynamically twinkle and ripple. Passing mists periodically shroud the view. A figure subtly shifts, their gaze tracking a celestial body as it drifts. Distant lights pulse.
